data.eml:eml: Trichouropoda turcicaovalis sp. nov., a new uropodine mite (Acari: Mesostigmata: Trematuridae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bal, Durmuş Ali, Özkan, Muhlis (2006): Trichouropoda turcicaovalis sp. nov., a new uropodine mite (Acari: Mesostigmata: Trematuridae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 1132: 31-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171906
